caption: [The Sheldonian Theatre](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheldonian_Theatre), an exquisite building situated in Oxfordâ€™s city centre, is the ceremonial hall of the University of Oxford and the location of matriculation and graduation ceremonies, [Encaenia](https://www.ox.ac.uk/news-and-events/The-University-Year/Encaenia) and [Congregation](https://governance.admin.ox.ac.uk/legislation/statute-iv-congregation).
